name: newtons first law
description: An object remains at rest or in uniform motion unless acted on by a net external force.

name: newtons second law
description: Force equals mass times acceleration.

name: newtons third law
description: For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction.

name: weight
description: Weight is the force of gravity acting on a mass.

name: momentum
description: Momentum is mass multiplied by velocity.

name: impulse
description: Impulse is force applied over time.

name: kinetic energy
description: Kinetic energy is the energy of motion.

name: potential energy
description: Gravitational potential energy depends on height.

name: work done
description: Work is force multiplied by distance moved.

name: power
description: Power is the rate of doing work.

name: power electrical
description: Electrical power equals voltage times current.

name: ohms law
description: Voltage equals current times resistance.

name: resistance
description: Resistance depends on resistivity, length, and cross-sectional area.

name: coulombs law
description: Electric force between two charges.

name: gravitational force
description: Newton's law of universal gravitation.

name: density
description: Density is mass divided by volume.

name: pressure
description: Pressure is force per unit area.

name: hookes law
description: Force in a spring is proportional to extension.

name: spring energy
description: Elastic potential energy stored in a spring.

name: wave speed
description: Wave speed equals frequency times wavelength.

name: frequency
description: Frequency is the inverse of period.

name: snells law
description: Snell's law describes refraction of light.

name: magnification
description: Magnification is image height divided by object height.

name: lens equation
description: Relates focal length, object distance, and image distance.

name: centripetal force
description: Force required for circular motion.

name: centripetal acceleration
description: Acceleration toward the center of circular motion.

name: escape velocity
description: Minimum velocity needed to escape a gravitational field.

name: orbital velocity
description: Velocity required to maintain a stable orbit.

name: ideal gas law
description: Relates pressure, volume, temperature, and moles of gas.

name: boyles law
description: Pressure is inversely proportional to volume.

name: charles law
description: Volume is proportional to temperature.

name: thermal energy
description: Heat energy depends on mass, specific heat, and temperature change.

name: latent heat
description: Energy required for a phase change.

name: efficiency
description: Efficiency is useful energy divided by input energy.

name: mechanical advantage
description: Mechanical advantage compares output force to input force.

name: pressure in fluids
description: Pressure increases with depth in a fluid.

name: buoyant force
description: Buoyant force equals weight of displaced fluid.

name: electric field
description: Electric field is force per unit charge.

name: electric potential energy
description: Potential energy between two charges.

name: magnetic force
description: Force on a moving charge in a magnetic field.

name: lorentz force
description: Combined electric and magnetic force on a charge.

name: magnetic flux
description: Magnetic flux is field strength times area.

name: faradays law
description: Induced emf is proportional to rate of change of magnetic flux.

name: capacitance
description: Capacitance is charge stored per volt.

name: energy stored in capacitor
description: Energy stored in a capacitor.

name: inductive reactance
description: Reactance of an inductor.

name: capacitive reactance
description: Reactance of a capacitor.

name: angular velocity
description: Angular velocity is the rate of change of angular displacement.

name: angular acceleration
description: Angular acceleration is the rate of change of angular velocity.

name: moment of inertia solid sphere
description: Moment of inertia for a solid sphere rotating about its center.

name: moment of inertia solid cylinder
description: Moment of inertia for a solid cylinder rotating about its axis.

name: moment of inertia thin rod center
description: Moment of inertia of a thin rod about its center.

name: moment of inertia thin rod end
description: Moment of inertia of a thin rod about one end.

name: torque
description: Torque is the rotational equivalent of force.

name: rotational kinetic energy
description: Energy of a rotating object.

name: harmonic oscillator
description: Position of a simple harmonic oscillator.

name: pendulum period small angle
description: Period of a simple pendulum for small oscillations.

name: spring period
description: Period of a mass-spring oscillator.

name: wave equation
description: Wave speed on a stretched string.

name: intensity
description: Intensity is power per unit area.

name: sound level
description: Sound level in decibels.

name: index of refraction
description: Index of refraction is the ratio of light speed in vacuum to medium.

name: magnification lens
description: Magnification for thin lenses.

name: electric field point charge
description: Electric field around a point charge.

name: electric potential point charge
description: Electric potential around a point charge.

name: capacitance parallel plate
description: Capacitance of a parallel plate capacitor.

name: magnetic force on wire
description: Force on a current-carrying wire in a magnetic field.

name: magnetic flux
description: Magnetic flux through a surface.

name: induced emf
description: Induced emf from changing magnetic flux.

name: lorentz force full
description: Force on a charged particle in electric and magnetic fields.

name: resonant frequency lc circuit
description: Resonant frequency of an LC circuit.

name: thermal conduction
description: Heat conduction through a material.

name: radiation heat transfer
description: Thermal radiation power emitted by a surface.

name: ideal gas internal energy
description: Internal energy of a monatomic ideal gas.

name: bernoulli equation
formula: P + 0.5 * rho * v^2 + rho * g * h = constant
description: Bernoulli's principle for fluid flow.

name: continuity equation
description: Conservation of mass in fluid flow.

name: escape energy
description: Energy needed to escape a gravitational field.

name: relativistic time dilation
description: Time dilation in special relativity.

name: relativistic length contraction
description: Length contraction in special relativity.

name: relativistic momentum
description: Momentum at relativistic speeds.

name: lorentz factor
description: Lorentz factor in relativity.

name: relativistic energy
description: Total relativistic energy.

name: mass energy equivalence
description: Einstein's mass-energy equivalence.

name: photoelectric effect
description: Maximum kinetic energy of photoelectrons.

name: de broglie wavelength
description: Wavelength of a particle.

name: heisenberg uncertainty
description: Position-momentum uncertainty principle.

name: bohr radius
formula: a0 = h*h / (4 * pi*pi * m * e*e * k)
description: Radius of the lowest orbit in the Bohr model.

name: hydrogen energy levels
description: Energy levels of the hydrogen atom.

name: thermal wavelength
formula: lambda = h / sqrt(2 * pi * m * k * T)
description: Thermal de Broglie wavelength.

name: lagrangian mechanics
description: The Lagrangian is defined as kinetic energy minus potential energy.

name: euler lagrange equation
description: Gives the equations of motion for a system described by a Lagrangian.

name: hamiltonian mechanics
description: The Hamiltonian is the total energy of the system expressed in canonical coordinates.

name: damped harmonic oscillator
description: Solution for a damped harmonic oscillator.

name: driven harmonic oscillator
description: Equation of motion for a driven damped oscillator.

name: first law of thermodynamics
description: Change in internal energy equals heat added minus work done by the system.

name: entropy change
description: Entropy change for a reversible process.

name: carnot efficiency
description: Maximum theoretical efficiency of a heat engine.

name: adiabatic process ideal gas
description: Adiabatic condition for an ideal gas.

name: bernoulli equation
description: Bernoulli's principle for incompressible flow.

name: continuity equation fluid
description: Conservation of mass in fluid flow.

name: reynolds number
description: Dimensionless number predicting laminar or turbulent flow.

name: poynting vector
description: Represents the directional energy flux of an electromagnetic field.

name: maxwell faraday law
description: One of Maxwell's equations describing how changing magnetic fields induce electric fields.

name: maxwell ampere law
description: Relates magnetic fields to electric currents and changing electric fields.

name: time dilation relativity
description: Time dilation from special relativity.

name: length contraction relativity
description: Length contraction from special relativity.

name: lorentz transformation
description: Lorentz transformation for position.

name: schrodinger equation time dependent
description: Time-dependent Schrödinger equation.

name: uncertainty principle
description: Heisenberg uncertainty principle.

name: particle in a box energy levels
description: Energy levels for a particle in a 1D infinite potential well.

name: radioactive decay law
description: Radioactive decay equation.

name: mass defect
description: Difference between mass of nucleons and actual nucleus mass.

name: hubble law
description: Recession velocity proportional to distance.

name: schwarzschild radius
description: Radius of a non-rotating black hole.

name: stefan boltzmann law
description: Total power radiated by a blackbody.

name: schrodinger equation time independent
description: Time-independent Schrödinger equation describing stationary states.

name: de broglie wavelength
description: Matter-wave wavelength of a particle.

name: probability density quantum
description: Probability density of finding a particle at a given position.

name: hydrogen atom energy levels
description: Energy levels of the hydrogen atom.

name: relativistic momentum
description: Momentum at relativistic speeds.

name: relativistic energy
description: Total relativistic energy of a particle.

name: lorentz factor
description: Relativistic gamma factor.

name: relativistic doppler shift
description: Relativistic Doppler shift for light.

name: electric field of point charge
description: Electric field magnitude from a point charge.

name: magnetic field of long wire
description: Magnetic field around a long straight current-carrying wire.

name: induced emf faraday
description: Induced EMF from changing magnetic flux.

name: capacitance parallel plate
description: Capacitance of a parallel-plate capacitor.

name: stokes drag
description: Drag force on a sphere in laminar flow.

name: poiseuille law
description: Flow rate of a viscous fluid through a pipe.

name: buoyant force
description: Buoyant force on an object submerged in a fluid.

name: ideal gas law alternate
description: Equation of state for an ideal gas.

name: boltzmann factor
description: Probability of a system being in a state with energy E.

name: heat engine efficiency
description: Efficiency of a heat engine.

name: orbital velocity
description: Orbital velocity for a circular orbit.

name: kepler third law
description: Relates orbital period to orbital radius.

name: wien displacement law
description: Peak wavelength of blackbody radiation.

name: snell law
description: Law of refraction for light.

name: lens equation
description: Thin lens equation.

name: diffraction grating equation
description: Condition for constructive interference in a diffraction grating.

name: maxwell wave equation electric field
description: Wave equation for the electric field in free space.

name: maxwell wave equation magnetic field
description: Wave equation for the magnetic field in free space.

name: quantum tunneling probability
description: Approximate tunneling probability through a potential barrier.

name: fermi energy
description: Fermi energy of an electron gas.

name: bose einstein distribution
description: Distribution of bosons over energy states.

name: fermi dirac distribution
description: Distribution of fermions over energy states.

name: compton scattering formula
description: Wavelength shift due to Compton scattering.

name: planck radiation law
description: Spectral radiance of a blackbody at temperature T.

name: rayleigh jeans law
description: Low-frequency approximation of blackbody radiation.

name: gravitational redshift
description: Redshift of light escaping a gravitational field.

name: escape velocity
description: Minimum velocity needed to escape a gravitational field.

name: gravitational potential energy general
description: Gravitational potential energy for two masses.

name: cosmological hubble time
description: Approximate age of the universe from Hubble's constant.

name: cosmological critical density
description: Density required for a flat universe.

name: plasma frequency
description: Natural oscillation frequency of electrons in a plasma.

name: cyclotron frequency
description: Frequency of circular motion of a charged particle in a magnetic field.

name: nuclear binding energy
description: Energy required to separate a nucleus into its nucleons.

name: half life formula
description: Time required for half of a radioactive sample to decay.

name: wave speed on string
description: Speed of a wave on a stretched string.

name: standing wave frequencies string
description: Harmonic frequencies for a string fixed at both ends.

name: intensity sound wave
description: Intensity of a sound wave spreading spherically.

name: doppler effect sound
description: Doppler shift for sound waves.

name: thin film interference
description: Condition for destructive interference in thin films.

name: malus law
description: Intensity of polarized light after passing through a polarizer.
